author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It’s often difficult to keep track of the Marvel Cinematic Universe and what new projects might be in the works. It becomes especially difficult when such projects have yet to be announced. Now, however, one MCU sequel finally seems to be moving forward at Marvel Studios. Interestingly, this particular announcement seems to have been shared [...]

The post MCU Sequel Finally Moving Forward At Marvel Studios appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: MCU Sequel Finally Moving Forward At Marvel Studios

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Work is underway on a live-action movie adaptation of the Legend of Zelda video game franchise. Excitingly enough, fans now have their first look at the new movie, which includes the live-action actors for Link and Zelda. Bo Bragason will be playing Princess Zelda in the movie with Benjamin Evan Ainsworth portraying Link. As you [...]

The post First Look At Live-Action ‘The Legend Of Zelda’ Movie Revealed appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: First Look At Live-Action ‘The Legend Of Zelda’ Movie Revealed
